notes.text: sap.ui.table.Table: Added cozy mode
sap.ui.unified.Menu: Cozy mode for BlueCrystal and HCB theme introduced
Ensured existence of namespace during Core.initLibrary()
MatrixLayoutCell: Alignment fixed
MatrixLayoutCell: Alignment fixed in Chrome
MatrixLayoutCell: hAlign fixed
Tree: Selection restored after model change
commons.Dialog: Inital setting of focus fixed
core.Popup: Saving of '_followOfHandler' fixed
sap.m.DatePicker, sap.ui.commons.DatePicker: Keyboard navigation fixed
sap.ui.commons.Accordion: setCollapsedState DOM check fixed
sap.ui.commons.RatingIndictor: Focus outline color adapted in High Contrast theme
sap.ui.commons.RoadMap: Scrolling to first visible step when step is not yet rendered does not cause an error
sap.ui.commons.TextField, ComboBox, DropdownBox: liveChange event added
ui.commons.Toolbar: toolbar not updated during rendering phase
ux3.SegmentedButton: Not focusable when disabled
ux3.ToolPopup & commons.Dialog: Fixed focusable elements
sap.ui.commons.Menubar: Support for MenuItems without submenus added
MatrixLayout: text-align is not inherited
Tree: Support binding on named models
Tree: onThemeChanged checks for existance of buttons
commons.Dialog: Invalidation of Dialog stopped if dialog isn't open
sap.ui.Carousel: Carousel in vertical mode reads correctly with JAWS 16
sap.ui.Carousel: Carousel items in vertical mode are displayed correctly
sap.ui.commons.Carousel: Carousel items are displayed correctly with jQuery 1.8.1
sap.ui.commons.Carousel: Fixed bug in keyboard navigation
sap.ui.commons.ComboBox, sap.ui.commons.DatePicker: Combi-device added
sap.ui.commons.DatePicker: Added change event on mobile devices
sap.ui.commons.DropdownBox: Fixed input issue on mobile devices
sap.ui.commons.RadioButton: Selecting more than one RadioButton in the same group fixed
sap.ui.commons.RadioButtonGroup: Binding issues fixed
sap.ui.commons.Roadmap: Default step tooltips suppressed when RichTooltip is used
sap.ui.commons.SearchField: Suggestion is triggered when Ctrl+A is pressed
sap.ui.commons.SearchField: Showing invalid suggestions avoided
sap.ui.commons.TextArea: Fixed arrow up/down in edit mode
sap.ui.commons.Toolbar: Items in the overflow popup are now properly moved to the toolbar instance when there is more than one item in the popup
sap.ui.commons.Toolbar: Items in the overflow popup are now properly removed upon re-rendering while the popup is open.
Element: Additional documentation for event delegates provided
Carousel: Rendering of horizontal carousel items when navigating left and right is now fixed
ProgressIndicator: Screen Reader improved
SearchField: Suggestion event in case of empty value and startSuggestion=0 corrected
Toolbar: Keyboard navigation when invisible item(s) exist is now supported
Toolbar: Opening the overflow popup is not causing a toolbar resize when the toolbar is nested inside sap.ui.layout.HorizontalLayout
Toolbar: Tab indexes on the right toolbar items are now correctly retained upon updating item navigation
ListBox: Native scrolling is now used on touch devices
sap.ui.commons.Dialog: Fixes Dialog resizing beyond minimum size
commons.Dialog: Remove DOM when hiding dialog
commons.Dialog: In modal mode can be dragged properly in scrolled page
sap.ui.commons.SearchField: Implement F2 keyboard handling
sap.ui.commons.Button - Contrast for semantic color buttons in High Contrast Black mode is now correct
sap.ui.commons.TextField, ComboBox, DropdownBox: wrong tooltip
: sap.ui.commons.InPlaceEdit: alignment of button in HCB
sap.ui.commons.InPlaceEdit: syntax error if no content
sap.ui.unified.FileUploader: GoldReflection styling repaired
Tree node not expanding properly on Chrome
sap.ui.commons.ApplicationHeader: Placement of the colon fixed in RTL (Right-to-Left) mode
sap.ui.commons.Dialog: The close button has proper name when read by JAWS
sap.ui.commons.TabStrip: Fix selectedIndex when disable selected tab
sap.ui.commons.TabStrip: Tabs set to non-visible now disappear
sap.ui.commons.ComboBox: Adapt new data binding logic
Respect "themeroots" when resolving img URLs in Controls
sap.ui.commons.Carousel: Issue with calculating carousel size when width is set fixed
sap.ui.commons.Carousel: Issue with toolbar arrow not on place fixed
sap.ui.commons.ComboBox: screen reader don't read additional text
sap.ui.commons.RangeSlider: Grips not visible if invalif values
sap.ui.commons.TextField: Allow "AltGr+z" as input
v2.ODataTreeBinding - ApplicationFilters were not attached
Popup: Using FocusInfo Fixed
sap.ui.commons.ComboBox: error if sap.ui.core.Item is used
sap.ui.commons.Toolbar: Overflowing inside sap.ui.layout.Splitter is now possible.
sap.ui.commons.TabStrip: focusOut is triggered when switching tabs
sap.ui.commons.TextField in IE onInput called
sap.ui.commons.TextField: after enabling still readonly
sap.ui.commons.DropdowmBox: cursor moves 2 characters on backspace
sap.ui.commons.ListBox: Do nothing when the same height value is set
sap.ui.commons.RichTooltip: Enable binding text with curly brace
sap.ui.commons.TextView: default ARIA role "Document" is removed
sap.ui.layout.form.Form: use Label style only for direct labels
